name: Paris
description: Paris, known as the City of Light,is famous for its stunning architecture, rich history, and vibrant culture. Iconic landmarks like the Eiffel Tower, the Louvre, and Notre-Dame Cathedral draw millions of visitors each year. The city is a hub for art, fashion, and cuisine, with charming cafés and elegant boutiques lining its streets. Paris offers a unique blend of romance, history, and modernity, making it a must-see destination for travelers worldwide.
activites: Visit Effiel Tower- La dame de fer (Iron lady)UNESCO world heritage
